member.summary: Whether or not this has a song associated with it. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TanksRebirth.GameContent.ModSupport.ModTank.Songs
member.summary:
The amount of songs given for this tank. For example, the Green tank has 4 songs, which depending on the number of tanks in-game.
If this value is greater than 1, your song files must be appended with "1", "2", "3", and so on, depending on the amount of songs. i.e: The Green tank has "green1", "green2", "green3" and "green4", but since the brown tank has one song, it simply is named "brown".

If is greater than 1, this is how many radians each shot's offset will be when this shoots.
A common formula to calculate values for when the bullets won't instantly collide is:
(ShellShootCount / 12) - 0.05
A table:
3 = 0.3
5 = 0.4
7 = 0.65
9 = 0.8

Sends a campaign through the connected server.
Sends in this order:
Sends Campaign properties (name, lives, bg color, strip color), Mission Count Then sends each: Block Count, Tank Count, Mission Name, Mission Note
Then sends each: Mission Block (Position, Type, Stack, TpLink)
Finally, sends each: Mission TankTemplate (Position, Rotation, IsPlayer, Team) if IsPlayer is true, send PlayerType, otherwise send AiTier
member.param: The campaign to send.
